description:
Company


Luxe Du Jour is an innovative online platform that disrupts the luxury resale industry by offering consumers the ability to shop, sell, rent, and restore designer handbags and accessories all in one place. Our mission is to normalize pre-owned luxury and promote sustainability in the fashion industry. Since our establishment in 2016, we have sold over 50,000 pre-loved luxury items, reducing over 1,000,000 kg of CO2 emissions. We believe that everyone deserves a taste of luxury.


Overview


Luxe Du Jour seeks a highly organized and detail-oriented individual to join our dynamic team as a Full-time Luxury Resale Operations Coordinator. This role is essential in supporting the smooth operation of our luxury resale business. The ideal candidate possesses a strong understanding of the luxury resale market, exceptional organizational skills, flexibility to do multiple tasks, and a passion for high-end fashion. If you are a highly motivated individual with a keen eye for detail and a passion for the luxury resale industry, we encourage you to apply.


Responsibilities


  • Operations Support:
  • Client Relations:
  • Assist w/ appointment scheduling and client communications via-email, phone, and/or in-person
  • Inventory:
  • Assist in movement of inventory across multiple departments for purposes of order fulfillment, logistics, sales, and general organization
  • Live Sales & Content:
  • Assist Live Sales & Content Specialists w/ item detail upload across multiple platforms and chat moderation on daily/weekly shows
  • Logistics & Shipping:
  • Assist w/ item pick-up, drop-off and outbound shipping
  • Processing:
  • Assist w/ item authentication and general processing
  • Office:
  • Assist in the daily organization of the office


Qualifications

  • 2+ years of experience in a luxury retail or resale environment.
  • Strong knowledge of luxury brands and fashion trends.
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and Google products .
  • Exceptional attention to detail and accuracy.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


Desired Qualities

  • Passion for luxury fashion and accessories.
  • Strong work ethic and a positive attitude.
  • Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.


Compensation and Benefits

  • Salary range $50,000 to $55,000 per year
  • Health, Dental, and Vision Insurance
  • Holiday, Vacation, and Sick Pay
